data.Name: Galactic Cowboys
data.Bio: Galactic Cowboys are a heavy rock/metal band based in Houston, Texas. They combine progressive metal with a style of vocals influenced by The Beatles and the heavy playing style of thrash bands such as Anthrax. Original members Monty Colvin (Bass, vocals), Alan Doss (Drums, vocals), Ben Huggins (Lead vocals, guitar), and Dane Sonnier (Guitar, vocals) released their self-titled album in 1991, with the follow-up "Space In Your Face" in 1993. Sonnier then decided to leave the group. Read more on Last.fm
